question: Let <katex>$f:R\rightarrow R$</katex> be defined by <katex>$f(x)=x^{2}+1$</katex>. Then the pre images of 17 and -3 respectively are
explanation: For pre-image of 17: <katex>$x^2 + 1 = 17 \Rightarrow x^2 = 16 \Rightarrow x = \pm 4$</katex>. Set is <katex>$\{4, -4\}$</katex>.
For pre-image of -3: <katex>$x^2 + 1 = -3 \Rightarrow x^2 = -4$</katex>. No real solution. Set is <katex>$\phi$</katex>.
